snippet: A man with an assault rifle fired on a Chicago subway train as it pulled into the LaSalle Street Blue Line station Thursday morning, the police said.
lead_paragraph: A man with an assault rifle fired on a Chicago subway train as it pulled into the LaSalle Street Blue Line station Thursday morning, the police said.

headline.main: Illinois: Man Taken Into Custody After Shots Hit Commuter Train
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Man Taken Into Custody After Shots Hit Commuter Train
